text: Tamen de xianzhi [she mu wei luo] dui tamen shuo:“Ta [an la] de wangquan de jixiang shi yue gui jiang jianglin nimen, limian you cong nimen de zhu jiang shi di ningjing [zhu 1] he mu sa [zhu 2] yu ha lun [de jiashu] liu xia de yiwu, tianshimen taizhe ta. Ci zhong que you gei nimen de yi zhong jixiang, jiaru nimen shi xinshi.”
